title: Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work
description:
Today, on the podcast, Tig and Cheryl discuss none other than iconic comedy legend Joan Rivers, as seen in the 2010 doc "Joan Rivers: A Piece of Work." Nothing's off the table, including plastic surgery, roast battles, and of course, Madonna! *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
